body:
Flagging this as a potential Go 1.5.2 candidate, since (as noted at https://github.com/camlistore/camlistore/issues/642#issuecomment-147440668) there's no workaround short of forking all of net/http and mime/multipart, and even then your dependencies may use the unforked version of net/http.

And the fix is tiny.

/cc @adg @mpl
